title: PGSharp 1.47 Release
excerpt: The 1.47 update adds Android 15 compatibility fixes, refreshed joystick options, and resolves softban detection glitches.
content:
Highlights
- Android 15 compatibility is now officially supported.
- Joystick presets gained smoother acceleration and dead zone toggles.
- Softban detection received stability fixes to avoid false positives.

Tip
After updating, restart your device once to ensure the new background services register correctly.

title: October Community Event Support
excerpt: PGSharp team announces temporary route presets for the Pokémon GO Halloween event to reduce cooldown issues.
content:
Event notes
- Seasonal route presets appear automatically between October 20–31.
- Each preset keeps walking speed inside Niantic's safe limits.
- Cooldown helper pop-ups will trigger faster if you teleport too frequently.

Remember
Disable spoofing when you play in person to avoid softban timers stacking.
